report.title: Infection species list
report.description: Infection species list for admin use
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values v ON v.occurrence_id=o.id AND v.occurrence_attribute_id=751 AND v.deleted=false WHERE v.id IS NULL AND o.website_id in (#website_ids#)
